QuestData.Title: Get The Centipaarty Started
QuestData.Description: Okay, babe. Like I said, the ogres are too dumb to know what signing that charter meant. Now we have to actually get them to come along with us, so we'll be procuring what is apparently beloved local flavor.$B$BBeloved local flavor for drooling idiots, I mean.$B$BJust pop on over to the Noxious Lair to the west, it's that big horrible pit full of dangerous silithid. Kill a bunch of the Centipaar silithid and bring back the pieces so we can hand 'em out, okay? Ciao.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you got enough? These ogres don't look like the type to like small portions.
QuestData.RewardText: Ugh! This entire camp is like a sampler course of awful smells.$B$BLet's not handle these things any longer than we have to.
